Company: Medi-Lynx Cardiac Monitoring LLC, and Medicalgorithmics SA
Description: AMI Monitoring Inc., Medi-Lynx Cardiac Monitoring LLC, and Medicalgorithmics SA, the current majority owner of Medi-Lynx Cardiac Monitoring LLC, agreed to resolve allegations that they violated the False Claims Act by billing Medicare for higher and more expensive levels of cardiac monitoring services than requested by the ordering physicians. Spectocor and Bogdan agreed to pay $10.56 million, and Medi-Lynx and Medicalgorithmics agreed to pay $2.89 million.
